parties: In re ADOPTION OF (Involuntary Termination of) Patty Ann BRANDL et al. Appeal of Dorothy BRANDL.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree vacated and case remanded for an evidentiary hearing and to make appropriate findings of facts after ascertaining the competency of Dorothy Brandi and to establish a current record and ascertain the preferences of the children. A guardian ad litem is to be appointed for Dorothy Brandi.
MANDERINO, J., filed a dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
MANDERINO, Justice
(dissenting).
I dissent. The record does not sustain the trial court’s decree involuntarily terminating the parental rights of Dorothy Brandi. That decree should be reversed.
opinions.author: MANDERINO, Justice
